00091 /*
00092  * Ensure that srm_struct_util.h is only included once.
00093  */
00094 #ifndef _SRM_STRUCT_UTIL_H_INCLUDED
00095 #define _SRM_STRUCT_UTIL_H_INCLUDED
00096 
00097 #if !defined(_WIN32)
00098 #define EXPORT_DLL
00099 #elif !defined(EXPORT_DLL)
00100 #if defined(_LIB)
00101 #define EXPORT_DLL
00102 #elif defined(_USRDLL)
00103 #define EXPORT_DLL __declspec(dllexport)
00104 #else
00105 #define EXPORT_DLL __declspec(dllimport)
00106 #endif
00107 #endif /* _WIN32 && EXPORT_DLL */
00108

00111  */
